slides.title: Out‑Innovate, Not Out‑Scale
bullets: Knowledge velocity is Tata’s edge.
Foundry ONTOLOGY + AIP: capture tacit know‑how as computable, governed objects.

slides.title: China’s Scale: 10 GW Centralization (Speakers’ View)
bullets: >1M H20-class GPUs aggregated; heavy-industry power repurposed.
Months vs. years for multi‑GW sites; optimize time‑to‑learning, not megawatts.

slides.title: Exposure & IP Risk: Materials + ASML Context
bullets: Materials concentration → systemic fragility.
High China share of ASML revenue (recent quarters).
Security strip: speakers allege repeated ASML hacks; civil actions.

slides.title: Master‑Apprentice ≠ Scalable
bullets: Tacit know‑how doesn’t diffuse fast enough.
Encode business knowledge as shared, governed ONTOLOGY.

slides.title: Why ONTOLOGY ⇒ Velocity
bullets: Typed graph: Event/Actor/Activity/Location/Material/Product + links.
Exploration without new ETL; lineage in seconds; rules & templates for reuse.

slides.title: Two‑Path Architecture (Fast + Governed)
bullets: First Path: normalize feeds → Events.
Second Path: AIP proposes facts/links → human validation → writeback.
Rules & Action Types; object/link access; masking; audit.

slides.title: From ‘Tell Me’ to ‘Let Me Explore’ (Velocity KPIs)
bullets: TTFI ↓; Hypothesis Throughput ↑; Decision Latency ↓;
Knowledge Reuse ↑; Continuity ↑; Coverage 100% (pilot scope).

slides.title: China Centralization vs. US‑Style Centralization of Information
bullets: Speakers: SOE-driven picks, GPU/electricity monopolization, vertical integration.
US answer: centralize information (federated, governed) across firms.

slides.title: Athinia = US‑Style Centralization of Information
bullets: Foundry-powered, live since 2022; cross-company workspaces.
Granular access, masking, audit, revocation; governed analytics on shared semantics.

slides.title: Security Is the Feature
bullets: Object/link access; field masking; approvals; audit; purpose-bounded usage.
Move faster safely—internally and across firms (Athinia).

slides.title: 90‑Day Pilot KPIs
bullets: ETA variance ↓ ≥15% (top‑5 lanes); RCA time ↓ ≥10% (3 defects).
+2 engineer apps; 100% coverage; 24/7 rules; weekly Exec Slate.

slides.title: 6–12 Month Roadmap
bullets: M0–3: Control tower, rules, apps, Exec Slate, audit #1.
M3–6: IoT+QC, end‑to‑end lineage, template kits, Athinia workspaces, audit #2.

slides.title: Call to Action: Build the Knowledge Ecosystem
bullets: Adopt ONTOLOGY‑first; stand up Athinia workspaces; measure velocity weekly; template every win.
